record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that our 30 minutes be allotted so that there is 15 minutes for me and 15 minutes for the Senator from Ohio following my remarks.
What is the request, Mr. President?
Mr. President, I will restate it. Of the 30 minutes of time for the minority, I asked that it be divided between the Senator from Ohio and me.
So it is my understanding that the Senator from Texas wants an hour of morning business.
So it will be 30 minutes for the Democrats and 30 for the Republicans.
Yes, with our 30 minutes being equally divided between the Senator from Ohio and myself.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
